###User Defined Function###
_GUIToolTip_DelTool

###Description###
Removes a tool

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiToolTip.au3>
_GUIToolTip_DelTool($hWnd, $hTool[, $iID = 0])

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to control
$hTool
	Handle to the window that contains the tool
$iID
	Identifier of the tool
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
None.

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUIToolTip_AddTool
